results.title: Josie and the Pussycats
results.creator_credit: Tracey Edmonds, Marc Platt Productions, Universal Pictures, Riverdale Productions, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Jasna Stefanovic, Deborah Kaplan, Harry Elfont, Syd Dutton, Tony DeRosa-Grund, Leesa Evans, Marc Platt, Tracey E. Edmonds and Chuck Grimes
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2001
results.brief_description: Josie, Melody and Val are three small-town girl musicians determined to take their rock band out of their garage and straight to the top, while remaining true to their look, style and sound.

constellations_other.name: Conflict to cartoons
constellations_other.description: The Bell and Howell Filmo 70DR was a durable, 16mm camera frequently used by combat photographers like Robert Capa during the Spanish Civil War and Australian Neil Davis in the Vietnam War, but this Constellation goes to some much brighter places.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Tracey Edmonds, Marc Platt Productions, Universal Pictures, Riverdale Productions, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Jasna Stefanovic, Deborah Kaplan, Harry Elfont, Syd Dutton, Tony DeRosa-Grund, Leesa Evans, Marc Platt, Tracey E. Edmonds and Chuck Grimes
results.description: Josie, Melody and Val are three small-town girl musicians determined to take their rock band out of their garage and straight to the top, while remaining true to their look, style and sound. They get a record deal which brings fame and fortune but soon realize they are pawns of two people who want to control the youth of America. They must clear their names, even if it means losing fame and fortune.
description_for_label: Josie, Melody and Val are three small-town girl musicians determined to take their rock band out of their garage and straight to the top, while remaining true to their look, style and sound. They get a record deal which brings fame and fortune but soon realize they are pawns of two people who want to control the youth of America. They must clear their names, even if it means losing fame and fortune.

results.title: Joker
results.creator_credit: Brian Adler, Todd Phillips, Bradley Cooper, Emma Tillinger Koskoff, Mark Friedberg, Mark Bridges, Scott Silver, DC Comics, DC Films, DC Entertainment, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Bron Studios, Village Roadshow Pictures, Joint Effort and Warner Bros. Pictures
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

constellations_other.name: Movies in movies in a movie museum
constellations_other.description: The 400 Porto-Arc 16mm projector used the first electric light ever invented, which was perfectly suited for movie projectors. This Constellation explores the movies where characters go to the movies, by two movie-obsessed directors.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Brian Adler, Todd Phillips, Bradley Cooper, Emma Tillinger Koskoff, Mark Friedberg, Mark Bridges, Scott Silver, DC Comics, DC Films, DC Entertainment, Creative Wealth Media Finance, Bron Studios, Village Roadshow Pictures, Joint Effort and Warner Bros. Pictures
results.description: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.
description_for_label: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

video_links.name: JOKER - Final Trailer - Now Playing In Theaters

results.title: Jojo Rabbit
results.headline_credit: Czech Republic, New Zealand and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: A World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother is hiding a young Jewish girl in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler, Jojo must confront his blind nationalism.
results.headline_credit_for_label: Czech Republic, New Zealand and United States of America, 2019
results.description: A World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother is hiding a young Jewish girl in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler, Jojo must confront his blind nationalism.
description_for_label: A World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother is hiding a young Jewish girl in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler, Jojo must confront his blind nationalism.

results.title: Johnson & Friends
results.creator_credit: Ian Munro and John D. Patterson
results.brief_description: Johnson and Friends is one of the most beloved Australian kids shows, airing on the ABC in the perfect timeslot between school and dinner. It featured toys that came to life and starred ACMI CEO Katrina Sedgwick as McDuff.

constellations_other.name: Flipping through the evolution of animation
constellations_other.description: Animation has come a long way since flip books were popular. These optical toys gave the illusion of movement, but now whole films and special effects are animated entirely through computers.

constellations_other.name: Australian TV in the 1990s
constellations_other.description: In the 1990s, Australians and Australian culture was changing: so too were the representations of it on television.

recommendations.quote: Before Katrina Sedgwick landed the lead role at ACMI, she starred in a range of iconic TV shows and movies, including The Last Wave (1977) and E Street (1989). But our favourite role of Katrina's is the cheeky concertina McDuff in Johnson and Friends (1990–95).

results.description: Johnson and Friends is an Australian children’s television programme broadcast on ABC from 12 November 1990 to 25 December 1995. It was produced by Film Australia and lasted seven seasons. In the UK it was shown in the 1993 on TCC, CBBC, and then on UK Living’s Tiny Living strand for under-fives. It was aired in the United States as a segment on the Fox Cubhouse, an educational children’s program on Fox, from 1993 to 1996.
description_for_label: Johnson and Friends is an Australian children’s television programme broadcast on ABC from 12 November 1990 to 25 December 1995. It was produced by Film Australia and lasted seven seasons. In the UK it was shown in the 1993 on TCC, CBBC, and then on UK Living’s Tiny Living strand for under-fives. It was aired in the United States as a segment on the Fox Cubhouse, an educational children’s program on Fox, from 1993 to 1996.

results.title: Johnny Flynton
results.brief_description: Johnny Flynton is a 2002 American short film directed and co-written by Lexi Alexander. It was nominated for Best Live Action Short Film at the 75th Academy Awards.

constellations_other.name: Powerful women in the frame and behind the scenes
constellations_other.description: Lady Sarah (Rachel Weisz) exudes power in The Favourite. These female filmmakers and actors do too.

results.description: Johnny Flynton is good at one thing: boxing. He’s not too bright, and there’s clearly some issues in his past, but what’s worse, when he’s boxing, his temper flares up. His wife, Samantha, tells him she’s pregnant. Meanwhile, he’s got an exhibition match with local boy Artie Duane. Johnny lets him get a few punches in to look good, but when Artie starts taking cheap shots, Johnny can’t stand by and overreacts. He runs home, where he’s in high spirits, but that proves his downfall.
description_for_label: Johnny Flynton is good at one thing: boxing. He’s not too bright, and there’s clearly some issues in his past, but what’s worse, when he’s boxing, his temper flares up. His wife, Samantha, tells him she’s pregnant. Meanwhile, he’s got an exhibition match with local boy Artie Duane. Johnny lets him get a few punches in to look good, but when Artie starts taking cheap shots, Johnny can’t stand by and overreacts. He runs home, where he’s in high spirits, but that proves his downfall.

results.title: Jill Bilcock: Dancing the Invisible
results.brief_description: Axel Grigor’s hugely entertaining documentary traces Jill Bilcock’s journey from Melbourne film student in the 1960s to working as an extra in Bollywood movies and learning her craft when Australia had virtually no feature film industry.

constellations_other.name: Jill Bilcock
constellations_other.description: An editor’s work often goes unnoticed, but they’re scene-stitching not only brings the director’s vision to life but sometimes steals the show. One of Australia’s greatest editors, Jill Bilcock, has shaped some of the country’s most memorable screen stories.

results.description: With credits including Strictly Ballroom, Muriel’s Wedding, The Dish, Moulin Rouge!, Romeo + Juliet and Road to Perdition, Jill Bilcock is regarded as one the world’s great film editors. Axel Grigor’s hugely entertaining documentary traces Bilcock’s journey from Melbourne film student in the 1960s to working as an extra in Bollywood movies and learning her craft when Australia had virtually no feature film industry. Bilcock’s cheeky charm and illuminating appearances by key collaborators make this a must-see for film lovers.
description_for_label: With credits including Strictly Ballroom, Muriel’s Wedding, The Dish, Moulin Rouge!, Romeo + Juliet and Road to Perdition, Jill Bilcock is regarded as one the world’s great film editors. Axel Grigor’s hugely entertaining documentary traces Bilcock’s journey from Melbourne film student in the 1960s to working as an extra in Bollywood movies and learning her craft when Australia had virtually no feature film industry. Bilcock’s cheeky charm and illuminating appearances by key collaborators make this a must-see for film lovers.

results.title: Jedda
results.brief_description: An aboriginal girl is brought up by a white family that adopts her. As a young woman, she is mysteriously drawn to go “Walkabout” as people of her tribe have for hundreds of years.
results.description: An aboriginal girl is brought up by a white family that adopts her. As a young woman, she is mysteriously drawn to go “Walkabout” as people of her tribe have for hundreds of years.

results.title: Isle of Dogs
results.creator_credit: Eli Bush and Scott Rudin Productions
results.headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 2018
results.brief_description: In the future, an outbreak of canine flu leads the mayor of a Japanese city to banish all dogs to an island that’s a garbage dump. The outcasts must soon embark on an epic journey when a 12-year-old boy arrives on the island to find his beloved pet.

constellations_primary.name: Stop-motion and animation superstars
constellations_primary.description: Despite the ease of new technology and a legacy going back to the beginning of cinema, stop-motion animation techniques are as popular as ever.

constellations_other.name: Explosive footage
constellations_other.description: How the fireballs in the opening scene of Blade Runner connect to Fatboy Slim and Detective Pikachu.

results.description: In the future, an outbreak of canine flu leads the mayor of a Japanese city to banish all dogs to an island that’s a garbage dump. The outcasts must soon embark on an epic journey when a 12-year-old boy arrives on the island to find his beloved pet.

results.title: Interstellar
results.creator_credit: Legendary Pictures, Syncopy, Lynda Obst Productions, Mary Zophres, Nathan Crowley, Christopher Nolan, Jonathan Nolan, Emma Thomas, Lynda Obst, Joe DeWalt Brown, Joseph A. Zaki and Will Lucas
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2014
results.brief_description: The adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Legendary Pictures, Syncopy, Lynda Obst Productions, Mary Zophres, Nathan Crowley, Christopher Nolan, Jonathan Nolan, Emma Thomas, Lynda Obst, Joe DeWalt Brown, Joseph A. Zaki and Will Lucas
results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2014
